title: Frontend Development
description: Master modern web interfaces with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and responsive design principles.

title: Backend Development
description: Build robust server-side applications with Node.js, databases, APIs, and cloud services.

title: Fullstack Development
description: Combine frontend and backend skills to build complete web applications from start to finish.

title: Software Architect
description: Design scalable systems, make architectural decisions, and lead technical strategy for complex projects.

title: DevOps
description: Learn CI/CD pipelines, containerization, Kubernetes, cloud platforms, and automation tools.

title: AI & Machine Learning
description: Build intelligent systems with neural networks, deep learning, NLP, and computer vision.
